pages.text: Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Menus Private Dining Gift Cards Gallery Scroll Down to Content Hours & Location 32b North Market Street, Charleston, SC 29401 (843) 937-8666 info@churchandunioncharleston.com Now offering brunch every Friday! Daily 5pm - Till Dinner 10am - 3:30pm Lunch Mon - Thurs: Daily 3:30pm - 5pm Midday 9am - 3:30pm Brunch Fri - Sun: Church and Union Charleston is located on historic Market Street in downtown Charleston, SC next to sister restaurant, Tempest. Church and Union features Modern-American cuisine by Top Chef Alum Chef Partner Jamie Lynch, Chef Partner Adam Hodgson and Executive Chef Doug Watson. Facebook Instagram Large Group Reservations For large party reservations that would like to be seated in the main dining room: 12+ for lunch, brunch, and dinner We require a large group form to leave a credit card on file along with a selection of one of our group menus which can be found in our Private Dining Packet . Please fill out the inquiry form under the Private Dining tab and we will get back to you with availability. All other reservations can be made through OpenTable which will have our full availability.
